songs.title: Hey Girl
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I'm in love! Have you ever been in love?
Have you ever been in love so bad that it makes you wanna kill?
Makes you wanna collect the bitches toenails and finger nails and hair samples and... blistered skin from her hand, running away from you all day
MAKES YOU WANNA JUST KILL DOESN'T IT?

[Verse 1]
I can't believe she's into me
I had my eyes on this girl for a long time now
I can't believe she's into me
Even if she acts like she doesn't want me around
I can't believe she's into me
The only contact i have in my little black book
I can't believe she's into me
She might say that she ain't but i know her look!
I can't believe she's into me
Since grade school i had her...?!?!?!?
I can't believe she's into me
And when my homies tell me that she's not, it's just uncool!

[Pre-Hook]
I can't believe she's into me
YES SHE IS! (no she's not) x4
I hope she is

[Hook]
Hey girl, what's up?!
How you doin?
Hey girl, what you been up to?
Hey girl, what's up?!
How you doing?
Hey girl, i've been watching you

[Interlude 1]
Girls: Hey you know that ABK kid?
Yeah?
He fucking stalks me like everyday!
What a freak!

[Verse 2]
I can't believe she's into me
She's the sun shining right and i'm her knight shining armor
I can't believe she's into me
Even though she calls me crazy she knows i will never harm her
I can't believe she's into me
That's why i follow her everyday so she's ok!
I can't believe she's into me
SO I DON'T GIVE A FUCK WHAT THE POLICE SAY!
I can't believe she's into me
Must be hard for her to hold in all her desperation
I can't believe she's into me
So i hope this girl really knows my love occasion

[Pre-Hook + Hook]

[Interlude 2]
Girls: Oh my god! He won't leave me alone!
What?
It's really starting to freak me out!
Really?
For real!

[Verse 3]
I wanna be with this girl, I wanna treat her the best
Let her know that i'm here and that i have no regrets
Of all the things that i did just to get her attention
When you said that you hated me, I know you were pretending!
Girl, when can we be together i'll wait a lifetime
I think about you in my dreams like you were all mine
I always said that you were into me, so together we will be 'til we rest in peace, I love you...
Together we will be 'til we rest in peace, i love you!

[Pre-Hook + Hook]
